text:
Choy Huat Hong Kong Roast has shifted to Blk 5036 AMK Industrial Park 2. Stall & owner were formerly from Sims Drive, with their own supporters.

We ordered de roast duck, roast pork, chicken and charsiew. Each item was well prepared. We particularly like de skin from de duck, which was so aromatic and crispy. The roast pork was skillfully done with the nice crackling skin, which is only available at restaurants. We also like de savoury sauce, which compliments the rice and meat well.

Price is reasonable too. Owner is quite pro and would deliver de part of meat you request. Really enjoyed my lunch and will definitely be back.

Meat is good, but char siew waas a bit lean.
Like that the sauce wasnt too starchy.
Rice is normal, chili is normal.

5 dollars for char siew + roast pork rice

Coffeeshop can be v warm.

Dec 2020. Ordered chicken drumstick and char siew rice. Everything from the rice to the chicken and char siew tasted good. I preferred the char siew actually! Added a dollar for a small bowl of brewed soup. $6 in total.

Took away on May 21. Duck and Char Siew noodles. $5.20. The duck is really nice. Fatty and tender. Char Siew is nice too.
Ordered a plate of roast pork and Char Siew rice. Both roast pork and Char Siew's taste are out of this world. It has a smoky roast flavour and the fats are rendered nicely.

This stall sells Hong Kong Roast (White boiled Chicken Rice/Noodle, Roast Chicken Rice/Noodle, Roasted Pork Rice/Noodle, Char Siew (BBQ) Pork Rice/Noodle, Bean Sprout, Oyster Sauce Veg).  The various HK roast is nice. Ordered the Char Siew pork, Roasted Pork and White Chicken. The white boiled chicken (白鸡) is tender and juicy. The Char Siew pork and roasted pork are good too. Does not sell roasted duck at the time of this post. This stall is within a coffee shop, located within AMK industrial park 2.
